title: sans&serif posters from Antreposhop
content:
Sans&Serif poster set  
Created by Antrepo Design Industry as "Sans&Serif Posters" and it shows ,  
two cult design of the Typography. It's like a ying&yang in the font industry.  
more info at [Antrepo Blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016035641/http:/a2591.blogspot.com/2008/09/sans-poster.html)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016035641im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sanser01_4970.jpg)
author: antrepo
